message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $125. This is an excellent opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $125 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $115 for the product. I hope this meets within your budget and we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $115 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $112.50?  This seems like a fair price for both of us.
